name: Spook World
description:
FIGHT your way through hordes of ZOMBIES to complete the summoning of some DEVILISHLY DELICIOUS SNACKS!

Instructions:

Z --> ATTACK 

X --> DASH

Info:

Code, sounds, and art by me, except the font, which was taken from scratch.mit.edu

Music by -How2Boss- (aka squirrelsRcool)

The color palette is called "jeepers" and I got it from lospec.com

Made in a month for the Pixel Game Maker's Awards
